text:
On Windows XP (not on Linux, where it is well behaving) images are sent
corrupted, thatis just the initial part is sent, if the file is bigger than 2^16
thatis 65 kbytes. 
I tried to change the compression rate of a .jpg to change size and I found that
dimension (for pascal=smallint). For GIF type I had randomly results and only in
very large images.
I have checked this bug with Internet Explorer 6  and Mozilla Firefox 1.5.03,and
for both identical results.
creator: maminnel@tin.it
nick@webthing.com
text:
Pointing to one of several reports of the same thing.  Reopen if you can 
demonstrate it's not the same problem.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 34037 ***

creator: nick@webthing.com
text: *** Bug 40752 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
